name: Magnum Opus
short_description:
I've been sitting on this for a long time. I haven't the time to finish it. I mostly do programs like this and others on this account out of boredom.

I'll just release it.. you guys fork it or whatever you want to do. Finish it or whatever.

I'm putting it up here so I have a backup.

Support: irc.freenode.net #archseptem 
please report all bugs and troubleshooting information here.

"You think you know when you learn, are more sure when you can write, even more when you can teach, but certain when you can program."
--Alan J. Perlis
